entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 to 60 km/h becoming west 30 early this evening then light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 28 April 2016
